config.time-graph-title: TPa: At least 75% of 'In Progress' issues with the 'Task' type must match creation of a branch.(by Team, Hourly)
TPb: At least 75% of 'In Progress' issues with the 'Task' type must have different branches associated.(by Team, Hourly)
TPc: At least 75% of 'In Review' issues with the 'Task' type must match creation of a Pull Request.(by Team, Hourly)
TPd: At least 75% of 'Done' issues with the 'Task' type must match merge of a Pull Request.(by Team, Hourly)
TPe: Number of “In Progress” issues with the 'Task' type (by Member, Hourly)
TPf: Number of “Done” issues with the 'Task' type (by Member, Weekly)
TPg: Percentage of approved merged PR (by Team, Weekly)
TPh.1: Percentage of approved merged PR (By Member, Weekly)
TPh.2: Number of approved merged PR (By Member, Weekly)

custom.title: Get in progress issues with associated branches
Get branches associated to in progress issues
Get in review issues wiht associated open pull requests
Get done issues with associated closed pull requests
Get merged PRs with at least one positive review
Get merged PRs with at least one positive review

guarantees.notes:
#### Description
```
TPa: At least 75% of 'In Progress' issues with the 'Task' type must match creation of a branch.(by Team, Hourly)
guarantees.description: When an issue with the 'Task' type is moved to In Progress, a branch associated to this issue must be created.

guarantees.notes:
#### Description
```
TPb: At least 75% of 'In Progress' issues with the 'Task' type must have different branches associated.(by Team, Hourly)
guarantees.description: When an issue with the 'Task' type is moved to In Progress, a new branch associated to this issue must be created.

guarantees.notes:
#### Description
```
TPc: At least 75% of 'In Review' issues with the 'Task' type must match creation of a Pull Request.(by Team, Hourly)
guarantees.description: When an issue with the 'Task' type is moved to In Review, a Pull Request associated to that issue must be created.

guarantees.notes:
#### Description
```
TPd: At least 75% of 'Done' issues with the 'Task' type must match merge of a Pull Request.(by Team, Hourly)
guarantees.description: When an issue with the 'Task' type is moved to Done, the Pull Request associated to the issue must be merge.

guarantees.notes:
#### Description
```
TPe: Number of “In Progress” issues with the 'Task' type (by Member, Hourly)
guarantees.description: A developer should only be working on one issue with the 'Task' type at a time.

guarantees.notes:
#### Description
```
TPf: Number of “Done” issues with the 'Task' type (by Member, Weekly)
guarantees.description: Each developer should be finishing at least 1 issue with the 'Task' type per week.

guarantees.notes:
#### Description
```
TPg: Percentage of approved merged PR (by Team, Weekly)
guarantees.description: Most merged Pull Requests should have positive reviews.

guarantees.notes:
#### Description
```
TPh.1: Percentage of approved merged PR (By Member, Weekly)
guarantees.description: Most of your merged PRs should be approved by your teammates.

guarantees.notes:
#### Description
```
TPh.2: Number of approved merged PR (By Member, Weekly)
guarantees.description: If you merge a PR, it should be approved by at least 1 teammate.
